scripts.patch: npm version patch -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.major: npm version major -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.watch: nodemon -w src -w config --exec 'rollup -c rollup.js -o dist/browser.js -f iife -m true -n freesewing_patterns_shin --footer "freesewing.patterns.shin = freesewing_patterns_shin;"'
scripts.browserbuild: rollup -c rollup.js -o dist/browser.js -f iife -m true -n freesewing_patterns_shin --footer 'freesewing.patterns.shin = freesewing_patterns_shin;'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run browserbuild && npm run nodebuild && npm run modulebuild
